snippet: The Federal Trade Commission expressed hope that the winning proposals find their way to the marketplace soon, to provide relief to millions of American consumers.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission names winners of its first Robocall Challenge, public contest to design system to stop unsolicited marketing calls from reaching individual's phone; winners Aaron Foss and Serdar Danis will split $50,000 prize.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission expressed hope that the winning proposals find their way to the marketplace soon, to provide relief to millions of American consumers.

headline.seo: Two Deterrents to Robocalls Win F.T.C. Contest
headline.main: 2 Deterrents to Robocalls Win Contest by F.T.C.
headline.print_headline: 2 Deterrents To Robocalls Win Contest By F.T.C.
